backend/main.mo: Defines actors, types, authorization, user profiles, approval logic, and CRUD state maps for agents, leads, owners, and follow-ups.
feature_evidence.json: Describes feature evidence linking a UI update to affected frontend files, components, and test requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for multiple frontend files across hooks, components, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color tokens defining light and dark theme variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React app root and main.tsx script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router, protected routes, and role-based admin/agent access logic.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout wrapper providing header, footer, user greeting, and logout handling for admin and agent dashboards.
frontend/src/components/whatsapp/WhatsAp: Button component that opens a WhatsApp chat with a prefilled message for a given contact.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages the authenticated backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and related auth state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, roles, agents, and leads via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with theme variables, dark mode tokens, and custom styles for a colorful login page.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/AccessDeniedPage.tsx: Displays an access-denied message based on reason and provides a logout button that clears identity and cache.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Renders the admin dashboard with tabbed panels for overview, agents, master data, follow-ups, and reports.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AgentDetailPage: Shows detailed agent info and lead stats, including conversion rate, with loading and not-found handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/panels/AdminOve: Displays admin statistics for leads, agents, revenue, and follow-ups with a sales vs rent chart, fetching data via queries.
frontend/src/pages/admin/panels/AgentMan: Provides CRUD and status management for agents, including creation with photo upload and a table of existing agents.
frontend/src/pages/admin/panels/ExportCe: Exports agents, leads, and owners as CSV or Excel files using mapped data and download utilities.
frontend/src/pages/admin/panels/GlobalFo: Shows all follow-ups split into pending, overdue, and completed tabs with status badges and timestamps.
frontend/src/pages/admin/panels/MasterDa: Manages creation, editing, and deletion of lead and owner records with dialog-based forms and tabbed views.
frontend/src/pages/agent/AgentDashboardP: Renders the agent dashboard with tabs for overview, data management, and follow-up tracking panels.
frontend/src/pages/agent/panels/AddLeadO: Provides UI and logic for agents to create leads and property owners, plus view their existing leads and owners via tabbed panels.
frontend/src/pages/agent/panels/AgentOve: Displays an agent dashboard summarizing counts of leads, owners, and today's pending follow-ups.
frontend/src/pages/agent/panels/FollowUp: Allows agents to view, create, and edit follow-ups for leads, including status handling and date-based indicators.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login, user role/profile checks, and profile setup with a stylized gradient UI.
frontend/src/utils/downloads.ts: Utility functions to export data arrays as CSV or Excel files using client-side blob downloads.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values, supporting hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Describes the projectâ€™s schema, features, and architecture for a VR Homes CRM with RBAC, unified login, dashboards, data rules, and exports. Lists existing features, core entities, and architectural requirements without known issues.
